azurerm_virtual_hub.description: Manages a Virtual Hub within a Virtual WAN.

name.description: The name of the Virtual Hub. Changing this forces a new resource to be created.

resource_group_name.description: Specifies the name of the Resource Group where the Virtual Hub should exist. Changing this forces a new resource to be created.

location.description: Specifies the supported Azure location where the Virtual Hub should exist. Changing this forces a new resource to be created.

address_prefix.description: The Address Prefix which should be used for this Virtual Hub.

virtual_wan_id.description: The ID of a Virtual WAN within which the Virtual Hub should be created.

route.description: One or more `route` blocks as defined below.

tags.description: A mapping of tags to assign to the Virtual Hub.

next_hop_ip_address.description: The IP Address that Packets should be forwarded to as the Next Hop.

id.description: The ID of the Virtual Hub.

create.description: Used when creating the Virtual Hub.

update.description: Used when updating the Virtual Hub.

read.description: Used when retrieving the Virtual Hub.

delete.description: Used when deleting the Virtual Hub.
